name: Helane Blumfield
biography:
c.1980s - Vice President/Creative Director, Macy's South. Directed, designed and developed beauty, fragrance, fashion and home campaigns, store imaging, direct mail, etc.
c.1990s - Vice President/Creative Director, Advertising and Sales Promotion for beauty, fashion and home, Bloomingdale's. 
c. 2000 - Principal and Partner, SFI, Inc., design, product development and marketing agency.
